name: geo-optimization-system
description: GEO优化系统 - 品牌AI推荐优化工具

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev" "npm run landing:dev" "npm run windows:dev"
scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build && npm run landing:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../landing && npm install && cd ../windows-login-manager && npm install
scripts.start:services: brew services start postgresql@14 && brew services start redis
scripts.stop:services: brew services stop postgresql@14 && brew services stop redis
scripts.restart:services: npm run stop:services && sleep 2 && npm run start:services
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run start:services && npm run db:migrate
scripts.status: brew services list | grep -E 'postgresql|redis' && echo '' && lsof -ti:3000,5173,8080 || echo '所有端口空闲'
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules landing/node_modules windows-login-manager/node_modules
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:logs && npm run clean:deps
